Current teaching Fall 2020: Political Behavior. Fall 2016, 2017, 2018: Videregående kvantitative metoder i studiet af politisk adfærd, graduate course on advanced quantitative methods. Spring 2019, 2020: Research methods 3 (Metode 3), undergraduate methods course. Fall 2016, Spring 2018, 2019, 2020: Research methods 1 (Metode 1), undergraduate methods course. Spring 2011, 2012, 2013, 2017, Fall 2018, 2019, 2020: Research methods 2 (Metode 2), undergraduate methods course. Thesis writing I advise many students writing Master's theses.
